parameters.name: CommandIDs
parameters.description: Array of command IDs for the buttons you want removed from this CommandManager tab box (see Remarks )

title: ICommandTabBox.RemoveCommands
description: Removes the specified buttons from this CommandManager tab box.

parameters.name: CommandIDs
parameters.description: Array of command IDs for the buttons you want removed from this CommandManager tab box (see Remarks )

returns: True if the specified buttons are removed, false if not
remarks:
You can get the CommandID values using
ICommandGroup::CommandID
or
ICommandGroup::ToolbarId
after calling
ICommandGroup::Activate
.
